name: Physics Info

inputs.name: Rigid Body
inputs.description: The Rigid Body component that you want to retrieve information from.

outputs.name: Speed
outputs.description: The current speed of the Rigid Body component

outputs.name: Velocity
outputs.description: The current velocity of the Rigid Body component, represented as a vector

outputs.name: Angular Velocity
outputs.description: The current angular velocity of the Rigid Body component, represented as a vector

outputs.name: Total Force
outputs.description: The total force being applied to the Rigid Body component, represented as a vector

outputs.name: Total Torque
outputs.description: The total torque being applied to the Rigid Body component, represented as a vector

outputs.name: Mass
outputs.description: The mass of the Rigid Body component, represented as a scalar value

outputs.name: Damping
outputs.description: The damping value of the Rigid Body component, represented as a scalar value

outputs.name: Angular Damping
outputs.description: The angular damping value of the Rigid Body component, represented as a scalar value

outputs.name: Is Static
outputs.description: A boolean value indicating whether the Rigid Body component is static or dynamic

description: Provides all information about a Rigid Body component's current physical state, such as velocity, acceleration, and rotational velocity, as well as other relevant data
